feed.title: Tagged 'external stuff I love', Sightless Scribbles
feed.subtitle: A fabulously gay blind author.

entry.title: Library spotlight: Queer Liberation Library.
entry.content:
Book censorship is very, very, important to me, so when I see libraries that directly challenge book censorship, well, I love them!

I’ve written many times in my blog about why I love libraries and detest book censorship. I’m here to promote a free nationwide library for the USA!

Queer Liberation Library is a digital library that uses the Libby app as their library platform. It’s free for anyone in the US to sign up, so donate your money to Queer Liberation Library or send someone the registration link below.

https://www.queerliberationlibrary.org/
